divs: sighting detailsi was sitting outside at home, in the country. i was observing the stars and sky, it was before sunset. for maybe 10 seconds i observed a green object with a lighter outside, the outside a turned orange\yellow as it descended. it appeared as if it were a plane crashing, on fire. but, it was green at first, so, i kno it was not .from where i was at, maybe lake michigan it crashed or landed in. but im not sure. i at first thought it was plane crashing. it was not. the whole incedent was onlylike fifteen seconds. i know what i seen, i was not fearful at all, but amazed. my sighting was enough to report, i was amazed and want to kno more...
Summary: green ball with white outer, the outer turned orange as it descended
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kingsley
There were no other sightings in Kingsley on or around May 10th 2013
